item.description:
Spring is in the air, and so is sailing season.  The Boston Sailing Center will be kicking of it's 2012 sailing season with its annual open house.  It will be a chance to view our hometown skyline while being breezed across the waters or the harbor.  In addition to sailing, the center will also be offering wine and soft drinks.

http://www.bostonsailingcenter.com/news/openhouse.asp

After getting our land legs back we can share our sailing tales over food and drinks at The Living Room.

http://thelivingroomboston.com/

 

********Please note that there is generally a wait list for sailing. This is an extremely popular event.********

Rain will cancel sailing, but not The Living Room.  In the event of rain, we will meet at The Living Room at 1:00pm.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the main desk inside the sailing center building

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Free sailing at Boston Sailing Center and Share a Meal at The Living Room
